columns.College_ID: A unique identifier for each college in the database.
columns.Name: The official name of the college.
columns.Leader_Name: The name of the individual who leads or oversees the college.
columns.College_Location: The geographical location of the college, denoting the city or area.

college.table_description: The college table serves to store information about different colleges participating in the decoration competition, including their unique identifiers, names, leaders, and locations.

columns.Member_ID: A unique identifier for each member in the competition.
columns.Name: The name of the member participating in the decoration competition.
columns.Country: The country of origin for the member.
columns.College_ID: An identifier representing the college associated with the member.

member.table_description: The member table stores information about participants in the decoration competition, including their unique identifiers, names, countries, and associated colleges.

columns.Round_ID: Identifies the specific round of the decoration competition in which the members participated.
columns.Member_ID: References the unique identifier for each member who participated in the decoration competition.
columns.Decoration_Theme: Specifies the theme assigned for decoration during the respective round of the competition.
columns.Rank_in_Round: Indicates the ranking achieved by a member in the respective round based on their decoration efforts.

round.table_description: The 'round' table captures the details of each round in a decoration competition, linking members to their respective themes and ranks.
